itemDescription: Member of the National Assembly for Wales (born 1970)

wikipedia_page.main: Llŷr Huws Gruffydd, (born 25 September 1970) is a Welsh Plaid Cymru politician, serving as a  Member of the Senedd (MS) for the North Wales region since 2011.

response: *Llyr Huws Gruffydd, MS for North Wales electoral region
